title: Can't report or block player
body:
So I copped a death threat in game. At the end of the game I keep reporting but nothing happens and block player is greyed out.
Why is this player not instantly banned for such threats.
Do I need to go to the police because you cannot police your own game?
Also I was reported by the premade even though I wasn't even toxic to these trash players.
I got a penta but still lost. Riot why do you put me with this fucking trash.

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: You can go to your 'recently played with' tab on your friends list and report them from there.
you can't report them from recently played, unless you mean open a support ticket and report them like that ?
In Situation like this, RIot find the place to hide and don't wana Answer you, bcoz they are bunch of cowards.
